mapper.select: SELECT t.team_id, t.team_name, t.area, t.uniform_color, t.uniform_type, t.team_ability, t.team_manner, t.emblem, tm.team_member_id, u.email, u.phone_num, ts.manner_promise, ts.manner_contact, ts.manner_rule, ts.manner_body_fight, ts.manner_slang, ts.manner_smoking, ts.manner_uniform, ts.manner_payment, ts.manner_arrangement, ts.manner_referee, ts.manner_tackle, ts.forward, ts.middle, ts.defence FROM team t JOIN team_member tm ON t.team_id = tm.team_id JOIN user u ON u.email = tm.email LEFT OUTER JOIN team_score ts ON ts.team_taker_id = t.team_id WHERE t.team_id = #{teamId}

SELECT m.start_time, m.home_team_id, m.away_team_id, mr.match_schedule_id, mr.is_set, mr.home_result, mr.away_result, mr.home_score, mr.away_score FROM match_schedule m JOIN match_result mr ON m.match_schedule_id = mr.match_schedule_id WHERE m.home_team_id = #{value} OR m.away_team_id = #{value} ORDER BY m.start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT t.team_id, t.team_name, t.area, t.uniform_color, t.uniform_type, t.team_ability, t.team_manner, t.emblem FROM team t WHERE t.team_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team(team_name, emblem, area, stadium_info, uniform_color, uniform_type, founding_date, team_reg_date, account, bank) VALUES(#{teamName}, #{emblem}, #{area}, #{stadiumInfo}, #{uniformColor}, #{uniformType}, #{foundingDate}, #{teamRegDate}, #{account}, #{bank})
mapper.select: SELECT team_name, team_id, emblem FROM team WHERE team_id != #{teamId} AND team_name LIKE '%${teamName}%'

SELECT t.team_id, t.team_name, t.area, t.uniform_color, t.uniform_type, t.founding_date, ts.manner_promise, ts.manner_contact, ts.manner_rule, ts.manner_body_fight, ts.manner_slang, ts.manner_smoking, ts.manner_uniform, ts.manner_payment, ts.manner_arrangement, ts.manner_referee, ts.manner_tackle, ts.forward, ts.middle, ts.defence, tm.team_member_id, u.email, u.phone_num FROM team t LEFT OUTER join team_score ts ON t.team_id = ts.team_taker_id JOIN team_member tm ON t.team_id = tm.team_id JOIN user u ON u.email = tm.email WHERE t.team_id = #{teamId} AND u.email = #{email}
